p: LC-DAD-MS n of Breynia fruits extract present different behavior compared to barks as shown in Figure 7. Peaks ascribable to catechin and/or procyanidins are almost not detectable. Intense peaks in the first part of the chromatogram are detected showing absorption maximum at 280 nm, some can be ascribed to phenolics. Chart 2 report the most abundant compounds found in fruits and leaves.
